transcript_chunks.text: oh he's gonna take your sword it doesn't matter it just doesn't matter ever in this game this is an allegory for life it just doesn't matter you have all the reasons you should be better than this but you aren't so welcome to life everybody enjoy it what are you doing suck it everybody dear satan i want to win allow me to win darkness oh allow us dark one to progress [Laughter] let the hog of ned be my offering to you this is satan's work
